para.text: (Key [, DefaultValue]) returns the lowest value of the any vertex of an object in the current element or cell that has a value associated with Key as defined in the
. If no such vertex values are defined, the function returns the default value if a default value has been defined. If no default value is defined, the function returns zero.

Example: If the formula were MeanVertexValue("A_Key") and there were four vertices of the object in the current cell and the values associated with "A_Key" in those vertices were 1, 3, 5, and 2, the value returned would be 2.75 because that is the mean of the four values.
